name: Project Spider (C_dubbz)
description:
Connect two controllers to play! Choose your fighter and drop the opponent's health down to Zero to win. 

Controls for the menu (referencing an Xbox controller):

A to continue to the next screen, X to change P1's character, Y to change P2's character.

Thank you for playing, and there are almost certainly bugs so if there are so big ones please let us know!

Designer: Brett Torra

Visual Artist: Sam Atilano

Audio Artist: Derrick Agyemang 

Lead Programmer: Dylan Tymkiw

Producer: Calvin Whitley
